    A class to hold some recursive methods that requested in the homework

    1.0

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static float calculatePostfix(java.lang.String str)
      Method that evaluates given postfix notation recursively which contains + - * / operations and every element seperated with spaces
      static float calculatePrefix(java.lang.String str)
      Method that evaluates given pretfix notation recursively which contains + - * / operations and every element seperated with spaces
      static boolean elfishChecker(java.lang.String str)
      Method that checkes if a string is elfish by checking every character of it if they contain either of "e", "l" or "f" characters recursively.
      static void recursiveTravel(int[][] arr, int startY, int startX)
      Method that travels given 2d array and prints every element from the given coordinates recursively by following a fractal path as from outer elements to inner elements
      static java.lang.String reverseString(java.lang.String str)
      Method that reverses given String recursively.
      static int[] selectionSort(int[] arr)
      Method that sorts given array recursively using Selection Sort Algorithm

      • elfishChecker

        public static boolean elfishChecker(java.lang.String str)
        Method that checkes if a string is elfish by checking every character of it if they contain either of "e", "l" or "f" characters recursively.
        Parameters:
        str - String to be reversed
        Returns:
        true if given String is elfish
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if given String is null

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the result as float
        Throws:

        Throws:

      • recursiveTravel

        public static void recursiveTravel(int[][] arr,
                                   int startY,
                                   int startX)
                            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Method that travels given 2d array and prints every element from the given coordinates recursively by following a fractal path as from outer elements to inner elements
        Parameters:
        arr - array to be printed
        startY - y index to be started printing from
        startX - x index to be started printing from
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if indexes are out of bounds or array is null
